caption.p: Identification of RSV induced apoptosis in MDA-MB-231 cells in vitro and in vivo. (A) Breast cancer proliferation after resveratrol and resveratrol + POLD1-OE treatment in mouse model. (B) Apoptosis was detected by hematoxylin-eosin (HE) staining after Resveratrol and Resveratrol + POLD1-OE treatment in mice. (C) Immunohistochemistry of related apoptotic proteins after resveratrol and resveratrol + POLD1-OE treatment in mice. *p<0.05, **p<0.01, ***p<0.001.
